movies.title: Bamse och tjuvstaden
movies.plot: Sweden's most popular comic book character - the bear Bamse - will now get his first own feature film. In "Bamse and the city of thieves" the strongest bear in the world and his two friends Little Hopp and Shellman show that the best weapon against evil is -friendship (and a few drops of Grandma's Thunder Honey of course).
movies.simplePlot: Sweden's most popular comic book character - the bear Bamse - will now get his first own feature film. In "Bamse and the city of thieves" the strongest bear in the world and his two friends...

biography.bio: Peter Haber was born on December 12, 1952 in Stockholm, Stockholms län, Sweden. He is an actor, known for The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo (2009), Beck (1997) and Happy Christmas! (1999). He has been married to Lena T. Hansson since 1990. They have one child.
biography.name: Peter Haber

biography.placeOfBirth: Mölndals BB, Mölndal, Västra Götalands län, Sweden
biography.bio: Morgan Alling was born on June 8, 1968 in Mölndals BB, Mölndal, Västra Götalands län, Sweden as Sven Robert Morgan Persson. He is known for his work on Roofters (2004), Arn: The Knight Templar (2007) and Allrams höjdarpaket (2004).
biography.name: Morgan Alling

biography.bio: Steve Kratz is an actor, known for Bamse och tjuvstaden (2014), We Are the Best! (2013) and Halva sanningen (2005).
biography.name: Steve Kratz

biography.bio: Magnus Härenstam was born on June 19, 1941 in Västervik, Kalmar län, Sweden as Johan Herbert Magnus Härenstam. He was an actor and writer, known for Fem myror är fler än fyra elefanter (1977), Fem myror är fler än fyra elefanter (1973) and Två killar och en tjej (1983). He was married to Birgitta Plånborg Ryott and Anita Bendel. He died on June 13, 2015 in Stockholm, Stockholms län, Sweden.
biography.name: Magnus Härenstam

biography.bio: Leif Andrée was born on January 29, 1958 in Stockholm, Stockholms län, Sweden as Leif Allan Johansson. He is an actor, known for Kitchen stories - chroniques de cuisine (2003), Daybreak (2003) and Happy Christmas! (1999).
biography.name: Leif Andrée

biography.bio: Tomas Bolme was born on April 21, 1945 in Stockholm, Sweden as Tomas Robert Olof Bolme. He is an actor, known for Julens hjältar (1999), Arn: The Knight Templar (2007) and Pojken i trädet (1961). He is married to Elisabeth Nordkvist.
biography.name: Tomas Bolme

biography.bio: Tea Stjärne is an actress, known for Tjuvarnas jul (2011), The Wizard's Daughter (2014) and Bamse och tjuvstaden (2014).
biography.name: Tea Stjärne

biography.bio: Shebly Niavarani was born in Teheran, Iran. Moved with his family to Sweden during the Iran-Irak war. He grew up in different cities in Sweden and had a early passion for movies and theatre. At age 20 he was accepted to Academy of Dramatical Arts in Stockholm and studied acting there for 4 years. After graduation he soon found work in Stockholm City Theatre where he has starred in more than 30 different productions, including The Junglebook, Invasion, War and Peace, Hamlet and Who's afraid of Virginia Woolf? He also worked at Folkteatern in Gothenburg where the Swedish director and writer Lars Norén was the artistic leader and also at the Royal Dramatic Theatre in Stockholm. Alongside his work in the theatre he also acted in many Swedish films and TV series and directs both theatre and short-films. He's the older brother of actress Shima Niavarani and cousin of Austrian actor/comedian Michael Niavarani.
biography.name: Shebly Niavarani

biography.bio: Ia Langhammer was born on August 13, 1962 in Stockholm, Sweden. She is an actress, known for Mother of Mine (2005), Un été suédois (2009) and LasseMajas detektivbyrå (2006).
biography.name: Ia Langhammer

biography.bio: Maria Bolme was born on February 1, 1965 in Sollentuna, Stockholms län, Sweden. She is known for her work on Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005), Sunes sommar (1993) and Commander Hamilton (1998).
biography.name: Maria Bolme

biography.bio: Tomas Tivemark was born on March 21, 1966. He is a writer and actor, known for The Unknown (2000), Bert: The Last Virgin (1995) and Cleo (2002).
biography.name: Tomas Tivemark

biography.bio: Edith Enberg-Salibi is known for her work on Braquage à la suédoise (2015), Easy Money III: Life Deluxe (2013) and Små citroner gula (2013).
biography.name: Edith Enberg-Salibi

biography.bio: Karin Gidfors is known for her work on Hotel Cæsar (1998), Rederiet (1992) and Les enquêtes d'Erica: La mer donne, la mer reprend (2013).
biography.name: Karin Gidfors

biography.bio: Susanne Kujala is an actress, known for Bamse och tjuvstaden (2014).
biography.name: Susanne Kujala

biography.bio: Nicklas Lindh is known for his work on Atomic Blonde (2017), Braquage à la suédoise (2015) and The 100 Year-Old Man Who Climbed Out the Window and Disappeared (2013).
biography.name: Nicklas Lindh
